overview:
Ilhan Refioglu President & Chief Executive Officer, SpectraLinear Dr. Ilhan Refioglu, founder, president and CEO of SpectraLinear has 35 years of experience in the semiconductor industry. Ilhan has spent more than 25 years as a CEO and at other high level executive positions in the industry and has successfully led both private and public companies.

He served as President and CEO of IMI (International Microcircuits Incorporated) from 1995 to 2000. After the acquisition of IMI by Cypress Semiconductor, Ilhan ran the timing technology division (the largest division of the company by volume) until 2005 reporting to President and CEO, T.J. Rodgers. He founded SpectraLinear in 2006. He acquired Cypressâ€™ PC clock division in October 2006, and established SpectraLinear as the largest pure play integrated timing devices company.

Ilhan holds Ph.D. and MSEE degrees in Electrical Engineering. He is married and has two boys.
